explanation: [0-0] In an ornately decorated hall, a father and daughter are happily dancing hand in hand. The father is dressed in black traditional attire with embroidery, while the daughter wears a white multi-layered dress, appearing innocent and lively. Beside them is the mother, wearing a gorgeous long purple dress. The floor is covered with white square tiles, and behind them are rows of yellow chairs and many guests. The surrounding walls are white, and numerous magnificent white chandeliers hang from the ceiling. There is a line of blue subtitles at the top of the screen.

[0-10] The man holds his daughter with one hand and his wife with the other, as the mother, holding her husband's hand, slowly rotates her body. The daughter watches her mother, then lets go of her father's hand and starts dancing on her own.
